BackstoryDef.title: factory scrubber
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: The lower levels of Alexandria’s factories were not built for comfort. [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] childhood clearing debris and wiping down machinery instead of attending lessons.

BackstoryDef.title: unit mascot
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Assigned to a militia unit for morale, [PAWN_nameDef] learned early how to entertain hardened soldiers. Familiarity with weapon drills and barracks life came naturally.

BackstoryDef.title: orphan
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up without stable guardians. Books and quiet observation of the Socialist Republic's inner workings filled the gaps left by neglect.

BackstoryDef.title: state ward
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Raised under state supervision, [PAWN_nameDef] followed structured schedules and communal schooling. Affection was limited, but revolutionary discipline was consistent.

BackstoryDef.title: sarissus shieldward
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Too young for full service, but never far from it. [PAWN_nameDef] trained with wooden shields and observed formation drills from the sidelines of the Sarissus Regiments.

BackstoryDef.title: squire
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was assigned to assist a knightly guardian. Stable work and sparring practice defined [PAWN_possessive] daily routine in the feudal high-lands.

BackstoryDef.title: dock foundling
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Left near Bedwyr’s docks, [PAWN_nameDef] survived by carrying cargo and keeping quiet. Formal schooling never lasted long for a child of the wharves.

BackstoryDef.title: young scrapper
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Broken tools were toys before they were tools. [PAWN_nameDef] learned to take apart and rebuild discarded machinery out of pure curiosity.

BackstoryDef.title: feral youth
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Supervision was rare on the outskirts. [PAWN_nameDef] roamed beyond settlement walls, learning survival through the behavior of animals rather than people.

BackstoryDef.title: georgiponic worker
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Even as a child, [PAWN_nameDef] assisted in soil testing and crop tending. Practical education in the dirt replaced classroom theory.

BackstoryDef.title: order ward
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Taken in by a disciplined order, [PAWN_nameDef] followed strict codes and shared training. Structure always outweighed comfort in [PAWN_possessive] youth.

BackstoryDef.title: order novice
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Early lessons focused on restraint and study. [PAWN_nameDef] balanced light combat drills with supervised learning within the Order's inner sanctums.

BackstoryDef.title: hydroponic worker
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Enclosed farms became [PAWN_nameDef]’s classroom. Nutrient cycles and plant care were learned by endless repetition in the grow-rooms.

BackstoryDef.title: novice of the hand
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Workshop floors were more familiar than playgrounds. [PAWN_nameDef] practiced shaping scrap steel under the patient supervision of the master smiths.

BackstoryDef.title: servant
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Assigned to kitchen and hall duties for the local lords, [PAWN_nameDef] learned to listen before speaking. Social awareness came from keen observation.

BackstoryDef.title: city urchin
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Alleyways and crowded markets were [PAWN_nameDef]’s upbringing. Quick reflexes and a sharp eye mattered more than any formal schooling.

BackstoryDef.title: garden tender
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Cultivated plots provided steady work from an early age. [PAWN_nameDef] learned the virtue of patience while tending to the Legion's food supplies.

BackstoryDef.title: trench runner
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Messages moved faster than officers. [PAWN_nameDef] carried them through unstable ground, learning speed and evasion over caution.

BackstoryDef.title: field slave
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Work began before sunrise. [PAWN_nameDef] learned planting and reinforcement under harsh supervision that allowed for very little speech.

BackstoryDef.title: farm slave
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Livestock and crop rows shaped [PAWN_nameDef]'s daily routine. Orders were given to be followed immediately, never to be discussed.

BackstoryDef.title: bloodbag
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Medical facilities used [PAWN_nameDef] for testing and fluid extraction. Clinical familiarity with needles and pain replaced a normal childhood.

BackstoryDef.title: kitchen servant
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Kitchens were hot, loud, and dangerous. [PAWN_nameDef] learned food preparation and timing while perfecting the art of not being noticed.

BackstoryDef.title: improviser's apprentice
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Salvaged parts became tools and toys alike for [PAWN_nameDef]. [PAWN_pronoun] practiced rebuilding broken equipment under loose mentorship, learning to make something from nothing.

BackstoryDef.title: penal fieldhand
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Assigned to prison farmland as a youth, [PAWN_nameDef] learned planting and repair work under watchful, armed supervision. [PAWN_possessive] social development lagged far behind [PAWN_possessive] labor.

BackstoryDef.title: penal ranchhand
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Livestock care filled most of [PAWN_nameDef]'s early days. [PAWN_pronoun] found that the beasts of the field were much easier to understand and please than the prison guards.

BackstoryDef.title: gang initiate
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Acceptance into the gang required proving one's worth. [PAWN_nameDef] learned quickly how loyalty and violence are intertwined, prioritizing survival over academic learning.

BackstoryDef.title: trencher servant
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Defensive lines required constant upkeep. [PAWN_nameDef] assisted in digging and carrying supplies for the soldiers before [PAWN_pronoun] was ever old enough to hold a rank.

BackstoryDef.title: young forager
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Food shortages forced early responsibility. [PAWN_nameDef] gathered hardy plants and trapped small game outside the settlement bounds to keep [PAWN_possessive] family fed.

BackstoryDef.title: matches child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Spare parts and half-burnt fuses were [PAWN_nameDef]’s playthings. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to repair small electronics in the dark, though [PAWN_pronoun] never learned the patience required for a fair fight.

BackstoryDef.title: war orphan
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Conflict erased whatever normal childhood [PAWN_nameDef] might have had. [PAWN_pronoun] turned to the study of old texts as a refuge, though the anger of [PAWN_possessive] loss never fully faded.

BackstoryDef.title: youth ganger
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Territory lines were drawn long before [PAWN_nameDef] reached adulthood. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to stand with [PAWN_possessive] pack and defend the district against all outsiders.

BackstoryDef.title: hydroponic servant
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Enclosed farms required steady attention. [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] childhood adjusting trays and monitoring nutrient lines in the windowless towers of the city.

BackstoryDef.title: georgioponic servant
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Soil beds and reinforced terraces shaped [PAWN_nameDef]'s early lessons. Construction work blended naturally with planting duties in the struggling colony.

BackstoryDef.title: scalpel sharpener
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Surgical tools needed maintenance long before they were used. [PAWN_nameDef] handled the cleaning and sharpening of steel in silence, learning the tools of trauma before [PAWN_pronoun] could read.

BackstoryDef.title: techkid
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Screens and circuit boards replaced playgrounds for [PAWN_nameDef]. [PAWN_pronoun] always preferred the logic of system diagnostics to the erratic nature of human conversation.

BackstoryDef.title: line runner
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Messages had to cross unstable ground. [PAWN_nameDef] ran supply lines and carried orders under fire, learning to move fast and stay quiet.

BackstoryDef.title: ruinborn
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Collapsed walls and scavenged lumber formed [PAWN_nameDef]’s earliest environment. Building shelter and finding edible roots were the first skills [PAWN_pronoun] ever mastered.

BackstoryDef.title: scrapper orphan
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Without guardians, [PAWN_nameDef] relied on salvage to survive. [PAWN_pronoun] treated broken machinery as both shelter and a puzzle, learning how the old world was built.

BackstoryDef.title: sorrowborn
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Raised during a prolonged siege, [PAWN_nameDef] learned discipline and study in equal measure. Long hours spent in bunkers left [PAWN_objective] physically unsuited for heavy combat.

BackstoryDef.title: green gatherer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: The forest edges provided food and quiet work. [PAWN_nameDef] learned which plants to trust and which animals to avoid while the world outside burned.

BackstoryDef.title: red gatherer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Hunting parties welcomed a child with a steady aim. [PAWN_nameDef] balanced the tracking of game with the defensive readiness required of a scout.

BackstoryDef.title: seeker
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Curiosity led [PAWN_nameDef] toward both ancient scripture and modern rifle practice. [PAWN_pronoun] spent [PAWN_possessive] youth balancing spiritual study with physical training.

BackstoryDef.title: young storyteller
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Evenings were spent repeating tales of loss and endurance. [PAWN_nameDef] learned early how a well-spoken word can steady a crowd even in the darkest times.

BackstoryDef.title: academy cadet
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Structured drills began before adolescence ended. [PAWN_nameDef] balanced rigorous classroom study with supervised weapons training in the Furian academies.

BackstoryDef.title: academy dropout
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Formal training proved less stable than expected. [PAWN_nameDef] left the academy before completion, retaining the basic combat skills but losing the taste for strict discipline.

BackstoryDef.title: surface scrounger
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Ruined surface structures offered opportunity to the brave. [PAWN_nameDef] learned to extract materials and defend [PAWN_possessive] finds against rival scavenger packs.

BackstoryDef.title: tunnel hand
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Mining and reinforcement duties shaped [PAWN_nameDef]’s childhood strength. In the deep tunnels, social interaction was always secondary to hard labor.

BackstoryDef.title: tunnel scrapper
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Salvaged components filled [PAWN_nameDef]’s workshop corner. [PAWN_pronoun] spent [PAWN_possessive] youth rebuilding discarded devices for practical use in the dark.

BackstoryDef.title: child soldier
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Conflict on Fury demanded early participation. [PAWN_nameDef] was taught to handle a weapon before [PAWN_pronoun] was old enough to understand the weight of taking a life.

BackstoryDef.title: child of the depths
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Underground life altered [PAWN_nameDef]’s natural rhythms. [PAWN_pronoun] adapted to the darkness and quiet, repetitive routines, finding the surface world terrifying.

BackstoryDef.title: stablehand
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Livestock required daily care regardless of the weather. [PAWN_nameDef] learned to read animal behavior and manage the stables before [PAWN_pronoun] ever received a formal education.

BackstoryDef.title: machinetalker
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Machines were treated with familiarity rather than fear in [PAWN_nameDef]'s home. [PAWN_pronoun] experimented with complex repairs under loose supervision, preferring gear ratios to conversation.

BackstoryDef.title: forgeling
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: The forge floor was [PAWN_nameDef]'s playground. [PAWN_pronoun] practiced shaping scrap and carrying heavy materials between stations, growing strong in the heat of the industrial district.

BackstoryDef.title: ashtender
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Burnt fields required careful replanting. [PAWN_nameDef] learned resilience from soil that refused to cooperate, spending [PAWN_possessive] youth coaxing life from the gray dust.

BackstoryDef.title: harvester
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Harvest cycles demanded constant attention and precise timing. For [PAWN_nameDef], crafting the tools of the trade followed naturally from the needs of the farm.

BackstoryDef.title: youth stitcher
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Fabric scraps became practice material for [PAWN_nameDef]. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to repair clothing and gear long before [PAWN_pronoun] was old enough to wear a new garment of [PAWN_possessive] own.

BackstoryDef.title: blueprint copier
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Drafting tables offered structured learning for [PAWN_nameDef]. [PAWN_pronoun] copied complex schematics repeatedly, gaining a deep familiarity with structural design and aesthetics.

BackstoryDef.title: slaghand
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Waste material still required direction. [PAWN_nameDef] assisted in moving slag and reinforcing work areas, learning the heavy, dirty side of industrial life.

BackstoryDef.title: guard batman
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Assigned to assist a senior guard, [PAWN_nameDef] learned equipment maintenance and the value of quiet, professional discipline.

BackstoryDef.title: guardhand
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Hall duty and minor tasks filled [PAWN_nameDef]'s early years. Exposure to combat drills and close-quarters fighting was an unavoidable part of [PAWN_possessive] upbringing.

BackstoryDef.title: trench orphan
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Defensive lines were rebuilt more often than homes. [PAWN_nameDef] grew up among sandbags and rifle drills, learning to keep low and stay alert to survive the night.

BackstoryDef.title: legion apprentice
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Formal training began early under Legion supervision. [PAWN_nameDef] balanced weapons drills with structured study, learning the history of the world [PAWN_pronoun] would eventually defend.

BackstoryDef.title: gunsmith apprentice
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Workshop benches replaced playgrounds for [PAWN_nameDef]. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to assemble and disassemble firearms before [PAWN_pronoun] was even large enough to fire one.

BackstoryDef.title: tunnelborn
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Mining corridors shaped [PAWN_nameDef]’s early strength. [PAWN_pronoun] assisted in reinforcement and debris clearing, seeing the sun only on rare, guarded occasions.

BackstoryDef.title: bugtender
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Livestock pens housed chitinous creatures that others avoided. [PAWN_nameDef] learned feeding cycles and minor veterinary treatment from careful, silent observation.

BackstoryDef.title: mech orphan
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Machinery outlasted family for [PAWN_nameDef]. [PAWN_pronoun] found guidance in maintenance manuals and discarded components, preferring the logic of gears to the warmth of people.

BackstoryDef.title: recycler's assistant
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Salvage yards offered steady instruction for [PAWN_nameDef]. [PAWN_pronoun] helped dismantle scrap and sort materials for reuse, learning the skeletal structure of the old world.

BackstoryDef.title: child militia
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Patrol duties began before adulthood for [PAWN_nameDef]. [PAWN_pronoun] trained with basic weapons and maintained equipment while still considered a minor by the state.

BackstoryDef.title: legionary bastard
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Recognition by [PAWN_possessive] high-ranking parent was inconsistent, but expectations were not. [PAWN_nameDef] learned combat basics and harsh discipline without any of the privileges of rank.

BackstoryDef.title: regimental mascot
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Assigned to barracks life for morale, [PAWN_nameDef] learned to entertain and observe soldiers at close range. Familiarity with drill and military humor became [PAWN_possessive] daily routine.

BackstoryDef.title: regiment servant
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Kitchen runs and equipment cleaning filled [PAWN_nameDef]'s early years. [PAWN_pronoun] absorbed military discipline and technical basics through proximity rather than formal command.

BackstoryDef.title: officer batman
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Assigned to assist a high-ranking officer, [PAWN_nameDef] handled gear maintenance and minor logistics. Exposure to high-level planning discussions came at a very young age.

BackstoryDef.title: camp hand
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Cooking fires and minor repair duties defined [PAWN_nameDef]'s early responsibility. [PAWN_possessive] social awareness grew from navigating the complex hierarchies of crowded military camps.

BackstoryDef.title: doctor's apprentice
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Medical tents became an informal classroom for [PAWN_nameDef]. [PAWN_pronoun] observed trauma treatment and assisted where allowed, learning to stay calm amidst the blood.

BackstoryDef.title: youth biographer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Journals and after-action reports captured [PAWN_nameDef]'s attention. [PAWN_pronoun] practiced recording events with measured detail, preserving the history of the regiment.

BackstoryDef.title: message runner
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Orders needed delivery regardless of the risk. [PAWN_nameDef] ran between units in active combat zones, learning the hard lessons of speed, caution, and navigation.

BackstoryDef.title: barracks bastard
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Raised among soldiers but claimed by none, [PAWN_nameDef] learned basic combat skills through imitation and the occasional rough lesson from a veteran.

BackstoryDef.title: ranger orphan
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Frontier patrols doubled as an upbringing for [PAWN_nameDef]. [PAWN_pronoun] learned tracking and animal handling from the rugged rangers who tolerated [PAWN_possessive] presence.

BackstoryDef.title: state ward
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Government dormitories replaced family life for [PAWN_nameDef]. [PAWN_pronoun] followed a life of regimented schooling, communal routines, and state-sanctioned study.

BackstoryDef.title: wallhand
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: The Great Defensive walls required constant maintenance. [PAWN_nameDef] assisted in repairs and carried heavy supplies along the parapets under the watchful eye of the guards.

BackstoryDef.title: junior commissar
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Debate and doctrine were introduced early to [PAWN_nameDef]. [PAWN_pronoun] practiced public speaking and political theory under structured, often intimidating, supervision.

BackstoryDef.title: kitchen hand
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Long hours in communal kitchens built steady habits for [PAWN_nameDef]. [PAWN_pronoun] learned food preparation and timing through endless, rhythmic repetition.

BackstoryDef.title: bisontender
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Herd management required patience and a steady hand. [PAWN_nameDef] learned animal behavior and survival in the cold Vasilevsky plains before [PAWN_pronoun] could write.

BackstoryDef.title: child recordist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: The state archives became familiar territory for [PAWN_nameDef]. [PAWN_pronoun] copied reports and maintained basic logs under the watchful oversight of the Party's archivists.

BackstoryDef.title: youth revolutionary
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Political meetings were attended more often than games. [PAWN_nameDef] absorbed rhetoric and revolutionary theory alongside basic weapons training.

BackstoryDef.title: cafeteria kid
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Shared dining halls shaped [PAWN_nameDef]'s social development. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to navigate crowds, state-mandated routines, and the social hierarchies of the working class.
